pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse Redundancy Analysis // Sparse redundancy analysis for high dimensional (biomedical) data. Directional multivariate analysis to express the maximum variance in the predicted data set by a linear combination of variables of the predictive data set. Implemented in a partial least squares framework, for more details see Csala et al. (2017) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btx374.
